Keep every world on: With LinkBuds your favorites are with you all the time. Comfortable, smart, and designed for real life, they keep you connected to the people and entertainment you love.
features: Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.
Bundle and Save: Save $50 on LinkBuds Speaker when you purchase with LinkBuds Fit or Open!*

*Offer valid on electronics.sony.com in US only for $50 off when purchasing LinkBuds Speaker with LinkBuds Fit or LinkBuds Open. No promo code required as discount applied when eligible products in cart. Offer valid on in-stock items only and while supplies last. No substitutions or rain checks issued. All features: In one tap, the LinkBuds Speaker enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android™ devices.5,6,11

Swift Pair makes it quick and easy to pair your speaker with your Windows 11 or Windows 10 laptop, desktop PC or tablet. Pop-up pairing guidance appears on nearby Windows 11 or Windows 10 devices when pairing mode is selected.
Sound to live with: LinkBuds Speaker combines clear, well-balanced audio for a comfortable listening experience with best-in-class call quality ever produced by a Sony wireless speaker.2
Small body, quality sound: The LinkBuds Speaker is packed with speaker drivers for clear and well-balanced sound. The two-way speaker system features a dedicated tweeter and an X-Balanced Speaker unit (woofer) for impressive bass and clear vocals with less distortion. A tweeter brings greater clarity across mid- to high ranges, passive radiators work together with the X-Balanced Speaker Unit to enhance bass.
Send the sound around with the Sound Dif: This compact speaker packs impressive sound that spreads all around. The Sound Diffusion Processor expands sound in any space with its DSP technology.
5-band Equalizer and CLEAR BASS setting: With a 5-band equalizer and CLEAR BASS setting, select your favorite sound setting and hear your music exactly as you like it.4
Clear calls keep you connected: The LinkBuds Speaker has the best-in-class call quality of any Sony wireless speaker.2 The top-mounted microphone is acoustically isolated from vibrations and other interference to ensure crystal-clear pickup. It ensures clear call even if the LinkBuds Speaker is placed in any direction. Echo-cancellation also ensures conversations flow smoothly, without echo.
Stay Connected to your music with Auto S: Auto Switch ensures seamless playback between your LinkBuds Speaker and LinkBuds earbuds for an uninterrupted listening experience. In wireless range, the LinkBuds Speaker can pick playback up instantly once LinkBuds earbuds are replaced in their charging case. Heading out? Playback switches back to the earbuds when they're removed again from their case.7
Set the scene with Auto Play: Whether it's something uplifting when you wake up, or something soothing when you go to sleep, set the time for your daily routine and your favorite tunes will play. Program your routine with just a few simple taps, then automatically enjoy playlists like 'Get Ready' or 'Bedtime', to bookend every day with the perfect soundtrack.8
One-touch listening with Quick Access: One press of the Quick Access button on top of the speaker and you’ll be listening to your favorite music services.9 No need to touch your smartphone.
Take the tunes with you: The handy, detachable strap lets you take your LinkBuds Speaker wherever you go, whether that’s into another room or to the kitchen. And with an IPX4 water-resistance rating, you can use it around water without worrying about splashes.3 Finally, it’s dedicated charging cradle ensures convenient charging.
Convenient charging\u00a0with the cradle: The supplied charging cradle makes charging a breeze. And the stylish marbled finish lets it blend into any interior.
Stylized for you: The LinkBuds Speaker offers a simple yet considered, unmistakable design that blends into any interior setting. You can select the color that best suits your style in either light gray or black.
Splash resistant: An IPX4-compatible water resistance rating means the speaker can be used in the kitchen without fear of splashes.3
More than a day's battery: Enjoy up to 25 hours of continuous playback.1 And get up to 70 minutes of listening from just 10 minutes of charging with quick charging.
Total convenience, total customization: LinkBuds Speaker is even better with the Sound Connect app.8 The simple interface lets you dial in your ideal sound and shortcut settings, including Auto Switch, Quick Access, and Auto Play. It can even keep track of your recent listening history.
Multipoint\u00a0Connection: For total convenience, LinkBuds Speaker can be paired with two Bluetooth® devices at the same time, automatically switching when a call is received, or playback is started on either device.5,6
Add an extra speaker for rich stereo sou: Connect two LinkBuds Speakers via Bluetooth® to activate stereo sound (left and right), to experience a rich sense of presence.5,6
Aiming to achieve a zero environmental f: Inspired by the beauty of the world, we are doing our part to help preserve the Earth while still offering superior sound quality and listening experiences. With a goal of achieving a zero environmental footprint across the entire Sony Group by the year 2050, we are accelerating numerous initiatives for the environment.
Sustainability in mind: Our products are designed not only to pursue sound quality, but also to consider the environment. Recycled plastic14 is partially used for the body of the LinkBuds Speaker. This reflects our work to reduce the environmental impact of our products.
Accessibility: We believe technology should make the world more interactive, more creative, more entertaining, and more inclusive. By incorporating human-centric, inclusive design into our audio products, we deliver our Kando experience to all our users, regardless of age, ability or environment.
